WarehouseCapacity.definition: Maximum storage capacity of the warehouse in dan

InitialInventory.definition: Initial grain inventory on January 1 in dan

InitialFunds.definition: Initial available funds on January 1 in yuan

PurchasePriceMonth1.definition: Purchase price of grain in month 1 in yuan per dan

PurchasePriceMonth2.definition: Purchase price of grain in month 2 in yuan per dan

PurchasePriceMonth3.definition: Purchase price of grain in month 3 in yuan per dan

SellingPriceMonth1.definition: Selling price of grain in month 1 in yuan per dan

SellingPriceMonth2.definition: Selling price of grain in month 2 in yuan per dan

SellingPriceMonth3.definition: Selling price of grain in month 3 in yuan per dan

TargetFinalInventory.definition: Required grain inventory at end of quarter in dan
